creator: NEW IT VENTURE CORP (SOFTWARE)
descriptionHtml:
BNPJ (Buy Now Pay in Japan) is an Integrated Wallet and Community Engaging Mobile App Managed and Operated by 3PLATZ株式会社 (サンプラッツ株式会社) for the Foreigners Living in Japan and for the people who are now preparing to come to Japan from across the world. Integrated Community Service Features are completely free for all the users who download this App. Leading Features and Functioning of the Mobile App are highlighted as below:

CREATE JAPANESE RESUME
You can Build a Japanese Format Resume in both English and Japanese Language without having Japanese Language skills. You can download your Resume in PDF file or Send/ Share it by email & Social apps. System will Build your Resume in Just 1 Minute after inputting all your details.

UNIFIED NEWS AGGREGATOR
BNPJ has integrated hundreds of community news feeds around the world based on your preferred languages & genre. Your recommended News from different genres is managed by AI considering your convenience. You can save the news offline to watch it later without using the Internet anytime and anywhere.

DISASTER ALERTS
Japan is a very sensitive and high alert country in terms of natural disasters, so receiving real-time alerts and notifications is very important for foreigners in their language. BNPJ has integrated real-time information for all kinds of disaster alerts like Earthquake, Weather, Volcano, Tsunami etc in multiple languages. BNPJ App will send alerts based on the event happening in the user's actual location as well as preferred location.

JAPANESE MANNERS & LEARNINGS
Japan is a unique and culture wise typical country in terms of their manners, lifestyle and customs. So it is very essential for foreigners to learn and understand the uniqueness and typicality of Japan, to make a comfortable & respectable stay in Japan. BNPJ has created & integrated useful contents for learning those Japanese Manners, Culture & Customs for Foreigners. This kind of information and learning is very useful mainly for the foreigners living in Japan or anyone who is preparing to visit Japan in near future.

BALANCE TOP UP TO PAY UTILITY BILLS & PAY FOR MERCHANT SERVICES
BNPJ has integrated most of the local payment gateway and wallet from Nepal together with credit cards to top up balance in BNPJ. Users can pay Utility Bills and other useful merchant services from BNPJ balance. Any users living in Japan can Sign Up for Choy-san Prepaid VISA Credit to top up your BNPJ balance anytime. Note: This feature will be launched in the next update of the BNPJ App so stay connected and enjoy the service.

CREDIT WALLET FOR SHOPPING & UTILITY PAYMENTS
BNPJ serveｓ & supports Safe, Secure, Beneficial & Convenient Life for Foreign
Residents in Japan by enabling Credit Wallet for shopping, utility payments,emittance and many more. Note: BNJP Credit Service will be launched very soon so stay connected and enjoy the service.
descriptionShort: BNPJ (Buy Now Pay in Japan) is an Integrated Wallet.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Top-up feature added. User can now load balance to the wallet.
- Many Services are added so user can make purchases.
- News and resume section has been enhanced.
- Minor bug fixes.
